attributes.action: BAN homework for all pupils in every school
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Ban homework, because i dont think it is particually necessary when children do so much work at school then they also get coursework & revising for important exams ... Putting homework on top of all that, is just too much.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
